Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, worth $1200000 to us. We are extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950000. This is an unprecedented chance to own something truly remarkable at a highly competitive rate. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
